articles.description: Mark Eden played Alan Bradley in the soap for eight years before his character was famously killed by a tram.

articles.author: Stevie Chick
articles.title: MF Doom: a hip-hop genius who built his own universe of poetry - The Guardian
articles.description: The underground rap icon, who has died aged 49, was a voice like no other, plundering and splicing pop culture to deliver wilful, elliptical lines
articles.content: It makes twisted sense that were only learning of the death of Daniel Dumile, better known as MF Doom, two months after his passing, with scant accompanying detail. An artist who thrived in the shado… [+7237 chars]

articles.author: Mark Duell
articles.title: Prince Harry uses photo of Princess Diana on new Archewell website - Daily Mail
articles.description: The updated Archewell website featured a picture of a young Prince Harry sitting on the shoulders of Princess Diana, taken at Highgrove in Gloucestershire in July 1986.
articles.content: Prince William will be concerned that his brother Harry 'appears to be exploiting his mother's iconic status' after he used a picture with their late mother Princess Diana to help launch his new webs… [+13856 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Smith
articles.title: Mariah Carey forgets Auld Lang Syne's lyrics while tunefully ringing in 2021 - Daily Mail
articles.description: While All I Want For Christmas Is You has stood the test of time as her most enduring festive hit, she also enjoyed success with her 2010 rendition of Auld Lang Syne.
